reviewText: This review is docked because Green Hornet was terrible...3D effect made me feel like I was watching this movie through the eyes of a cross eyed drunken monkey...Priest & Resident Evil were the saving grace for this 3 pack good 3D effect & story line & they aren't even movies I would normally watch...
Good Movies, Great Value, and Good 3D!

Being the frugal (read - cheap) person that I am, buying the set was a no brainer. They're the real deal and not some homegrown copy that comes in a brown paper bag. Or sack. Haven't lost any sleep over having bought it or them.
These three title deals help save a bunch over single release prices.  All three movies worked great.  I will look for more, for sure.
